item.title: HTX DeepThink: Global Liquidity Supporting Bitcoin's Strength, Core Inflation May Disrupt Markets Again
item.description: August 28th. Chloe (@ChloeTalk1), who is a columnist for HTX DeepThink and a researcher at HTX, pointed out in her analysis that by the end of August, the global M2 money supply of major economies reached approximately $95.116 trillion, hitting a historical high. Short-term liquidity remained loose, providing strong support for the Bitcoin price. At the same time, institutional concentration continued to rise. Bitcoin ETF holdings exceeded 1.3 million coins, and MicroStrategy added 430 BTC to its reserves again, indicating that institutional demand for allocation remained strong.Looking ahead to this week, macroeconomic data will be a core variable in market pricing. On August 28th, the revised US GDP for the second quarter will be released. Market expectations may be revised down from the initial 3.0% to 2.4%. The core PCE data to be announced on August 29th is regarded as a key inflation indicator before the Fed's September interest rate meeting. If the core PCE exceeds expectation

item.title: Strive CEO: Plans to Purchase Over $700 Million Worth of Bitcoin After IPO
item.description: On August 28th, Matt Cole, the CEO of Strive Funds, declared that they intend to purchase more than $700 million worth of Bitcoin following their going public.On May 27th, Strive announced the accomplishment of a $750 million private equity financing at a subscription price of $1.35 per share. There is an opportunity to expand this financing to $1.5 billion through warrants. Strive will concentrate on deploying a "superior Bitcoin yield" strategy portfolio. The financing will be utilized for acquiring biotech companies, distressed Bitcoin debt (such as claims related to Mt. Gox), and discounted structured Bitcoin credit products in order to build its Bitcoin reserve treasury.

item.title: SOL Surges Past $215 to Hit Nearly 206-Day High, SOL/BTC and SOL/ETH Exchange Rates Continue to Strengthen
item.description: On August 28th, based on HTX market data, SOL successfully broke through $215 for the first time since February 4th, establishing a new high that has lasted for nearly 206 days. It witnessed a 24-hour increase of 6.8%. This breakthrough triggered a short liquidation of $26 million.Recently, the SOL/BTC and SOL/ETH exchange rates have been on the rise. In the past month, SOL/BTC has increased by over 28.35%, and in the past week, SOL/ETH has risen by over 8.6%.

item.title: A-share Listed Company Highweida Explores Business Cooperation with Stablecoin RWA System Construction
item.description: On August 28th, Gaorong Capital. In order to actively explore new technological fields and industrial opportunities and promote cooperation related to the construction of the RWA system for stablecoins, recently, its wholly-owned subsidiary Gaorong Information Technology Co., Ltd. has entered into a contract with Digital Asset Clearing Services Limited and subscribed for 0.50% equity interest at a cost of $250,000 to deeply participate in stablecoin and RWA technology services. (Soochow Securities)

item.title: Gate Teams Up with BitGo to Launch Go Network OTC Settlement, Making Institutional Trading Safer and More Efficient
item.description: August 28th. Gate has successfully completed the integration with Go Network's Off-Chain Settlement (OES). This enables institutional clients to benefit from Gate's abundant liquidity while ensuring the secure custody of their assets in BitGo Singapore Pte. Ltd.'s licensed and insured cold wallet. With this integration, institutional investors can directly trade on the Gate platform without having to hold their assets on the exchange, thereby streamlining operations and safeguarding funds.This collaboration has introduced a trading structure that closely follows traditional financial models, achieving separate custody and trade execution operations, which significantly reduces systemic risk. The partnership between Gate and BitGo has provided institutional investors with a variety of trading products such as spot, margin, and perpetual contracts. Through automated settlement processes, operational friction and risk have been minimized to the greatest extent possible. This initiative

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: Brazil Plans to File Tariff Complaint with U.S.; BTC Faces Next Resistance at 114,000, Support at 109,000
item.description: August 28th: On August 28th, the Brazilian Finance Minister Ad?es might have filed a lawsuit in a U.S. court against the 50% tariff imposed by the U.S. government and warned against the weaponization of the U.S. dollar. This action has intensified U.S.-Brazil tensions and sparked discussions on de-dollarization, becoming a variable in emerging market fund flows and risk appetite.In terms of the cryptocurrency front, the BTC settlement heatmap shows 114,000 aggregated settlements and orders, posing a significant pressure point; the upper resistance is at 116,800; with support below at 112,000 and between 109,500 and 110,000.Bitunix analyst's suggestion: This event belongs to a long-term legal and policy game, and its short-term impact on liquidity is limited. The key still lies in the trend of the DXY and the pace of tariff implementation. If the "weaponization of the U.S. dollar" dispute heats up and settlement diversification spreads, it will be favorable to the BTC medium-to-long

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: NVIDIA Earnings Report May Impact US Stock Market AI Craze
item.description: On August 28th, NVIDIA announced that its revenue for the second quarter of its 2026 fiscal year was 46.743 billion US dollars, showing a year-on-year increase of 56%, which was slightly higher than the analysts' expected 462.3 billion US dollars. Among them, the data center revenue in the second quarter was 41.1 billion US dollars, which was slightly lower than the analysts' expected 41.29 billion US dollars. Additionally, the performance guidance provided was not very impressive, raising concerns in the market regarding the slowdown in the momentum of AI spending.After the release of the financial report, NVIDIA's stock price fell by more than 5% in after-hours trading. US chip stocks and AI concept stocks also followed suit and declined. AMD and Broadcom both fell by more than 1%, and AMD even fell by more than 2%. Bitcoin briefly dropped below $111,000, and ETH also came under pressure and fell to $4,482.BiyaPay analysts stated that the financial report has had an impact on inv

item.title: The funding rates for WLFI and XPL on Hyperliquid have remained persistently high, leading to a significant premium compared to Binance.
item.description: On August 28th, on Hyperliquid (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), the WLFI and XPL funding rates remain at a high level. Currently, the WLFI annualized funding rate is 105% and the XPL annualized funding rate is 242%. Meanwhile, on Hyperliquid, XPL is priced at $0.74, with a 33% premium compared to its price of $0.555 on Binance. WLFI on Hyperliquid is priced at $0.3, with a 14.9% premium compared to its price of $0.261 on Binance.Earlier today, Hyperliquid implemented a new mark price calculation method for pre-market perpetual contracts. The contract's mark price will utilize the standard mark price formula and be combined with the price of external pre-market perpetual contracts (if available).

item.title: US Stock: NVIDIA Down 2.2% in Pre-market Trading
item.description: On August 28th, based on market data, Nvidia's pre-market trading in the US stock market witnessed a 2.2% decline. The outlook for Q3 revenue remained flat, which triggered concerns in the market regarding the deceleration in the growth of massive spending on AI.

item.title: UnicornX Teams Up with FAIR3 to Host Trading Competition
item.description: August 28th. UnicornX made an announcement regarding a partnership with FAIR3 to initiate a trading competition. This event will run from August 28th through September 18th and will feature a total prize pool of $5,000 worth of FAIR3 tokens along with UnicornX platform points, X Points.Participants are required to complete a minimum of $100 worth of FAIR3 trades on UnicornX in order to be eligible. Rewards will be distributed according to trading volume rankings and a lottery mechanism, which includes a "Fair Draw" component to enhance randomness.
